text: Shefa is one of the six provinces of Vanuatu. It has three main islands: Efate, Epi and Shepherd, as well as many other smaller islands. Its capital is Port Vila, which is also the capital of Vanuatu. It is the most populated province of Vanuatu. The province's name comes from the first few letters of the names of the two main islands: SHepherd and EFAte. ==References== Category:Provinces of Vanuatu
title: Shefa Province
